Account Hello. Welcome to uCoin.
A decentralized system for free currencies. Login Register [Empty] Loading... Computing keys... Saving account locally... Connecting to node\n%s... Loading currency from\n%s... Saving currency locally... Getting membership... Getting wallet credit... Saving wallet locally... Saving node address locally... Sending registration data... Initializing app... Connection Connectingâ€¦ Not connected Unable to connect (%s) Cancelled Failed No result Open the navigation drawer Close the navigation drawer Wallets Wallet credit: %s credit not registred (%s) Alias Wallet alias (optional) Account parameters: Delete wallet Could not delete wallet (technical error)\n%s Are you sure you want to delete this wallet ? Wallet successfully deleted %s UD Loading wallets... Updating balances... Wallet Wallet To Receiver Amount Amount UD coins Comment (optional) Comment (optional) Amount must a valid integer Amount must a valid decimal Transactions No transaction Universal Dividend Refresh transactions Download all transactions Are you sure you want to download all transactions ? This operation could be long. Downloading transactions... %1$s transactions downloads in %2$s No new transactions Send Transfer Sign Home Search Sign in Test (dev) Settings Back Forward Copy Add Refresh Cancel OK Join as member Delete Remove Add as new contact New contact Add to existing contact Contacts Add currency Select a predefine currency: Or fill parameters of a currency node: Host my.domain.com Port (optional) Rules Money Web of Trust Blockchain Fundamental growth (c) / Time period (dt) between two UD %1$.0f %% / %2$.0f days (%3$d seconds) Initial Universal Dividend UD(0) in units %d units %1$.0f days (%2$d s) %1$.0f min %2$d s (%3$d s) Minimum delay between 2 identical certifications (same pubkeys) Maximum age of a valid signature Minimum quantity of signatures to be part of the WoT %d signatures Minimum quantity of valid made certifications to be part of the WoT for distance rule Maximum age of a valid membership Maximum distance between each WoT member and a newcomer Number of blocks used for calculating median time. %d blocks The average time for writing 1 block (wished time) The number of blocks required to evaluate again PoWMin value %d blocks The number of previous blocks to check for personalized difficulty %d blocks The percent of previous issuers to reach for personalized difficulty %.0f %% Peers Currency No currency No transaction No certification No contact No wallet Currencies Members %s members Transfer sended.\nWaiting network processing. Could not send transfer (technical error) Could not send certification (technical error) Certification sended.\nWaiting network processing. signature time not written Registration sended.\nWaiting network processing. Could not send registration (technical error) Currency [%s] already exists. Please enter either a full qualified domain name, an IPv4, or an IPv6 address, and a port number. Identity user or public key User User identifier Registration Date Registered since %s Signature Public key Details Community --> Next > Password Confirm Confirm password PIN code Add wallet New wallet Salt Salt (email, phone or words) Salt: We advice you to choose your personal e-mail as value for this field. But you can put any other value: it only has to carry enough entropy to avoid key collision. Typically, your personal e-mail is a good choice, added to the fact it is easy to remember. Password: Choose a very strong password, so no one can find it. This password can\'t be changed thereafter, so choose it carefully. Test Alias (optional) New contact (%s) You are about to add %s as contact.\nAre you sure ? Contact successfully added This identifier is already used. This identifier is incorrect This salt and password are incorrect. This identifier is too short One of \'alias\' or \'user identifier\' is required This name is too short This salt is too short This password is too short This identifier is incorrect This password is incorrect This field is required Salt and password already used by another wallet This salt and password does not match to given identifier. User identifier: If you choose an UID which is already used inside a community, you won\'t be able to join this community. So ensure not to collide with someone else\'s UID. UID cannot be empty Salt cannot be empty Password cannot be empty Confirm password cannot be empty Passwords don\'t match Insufficient credit on wallet A wallet with the same public key already exists. %s characters minimum Transfer to %s Sign %s yesterday Search error (%s). Please retry. Forum @string/home @string/currencies @string/forum @string/settings
